title: The quantum de Rham complexes associated with $SL_h(2)$
abstract: Quantum de Rham complexes on the quantum plane and the quantum group itself are constructed for the Zakrewski deformation of $ Fun ( SL(2)) $. As a by-product a new deformation of the two dimensional Heisenberg algeb ra is constructed which can be used to construct models of h-deformed quantum mechanics.
